Docs.summary: Represents a menu item inside a menu that can invoke a command and also display a submenu.

Docs.summary: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitMenuItem.DropDownToolTipTitle%2A> dependency property.
Gets or sets the keyboard shortcut for the header area of this control.
Docs.value: The keyboard shortcut for the header area of this control. The registered default is . For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks A KeyTip must be from 1 to 3 uppercase characters, and must not contain spaces, tabs, or newline characters. KeyTips are sometimes known as access keys or accelerators and are used as shortcut key combinations that activate controls. KeyTips appear on the when you press the ALT key. ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.DependencyProperty HeaderKeyTipProperty

Docs.summary: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitMenuItem.HeaderKeyTip%2A> dependency property.
Gets or sets a unique identifier that links a ribbon control to a corresponding control in the Quick Access Toolbar.
Docs.value: A unique identifier for a control in the Quick Access Toolbar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
